name: Slime Hell (Chowdog)
description:
WASD - Movement

mouse - Aim and shoot

E - Pick up gun

F - Discard gun

Every gun only lasts 10 SECONDS after you shoot, so beware of your timing and KILL THOSE SLIMES!!

Made by Chowdog and DDwolf

Commission for Bullet Hell Jam

Download instruction: Unzip the zip file then open SlimeHell .exe
